In a world where the SUV is all the rage, some of us still believe that a sedan offers great all-round versatility, especially when it’s a value sedan like the Toyota Corolla Quest.The Toyota Corolla Quest remains one of the best of the bunch when it comes to reminding us of how practical a sedan – the style of car that most of us grew up travelling in – is for everything from the weekly errands to the annual holiday.In terms of safety, two front airbags are fitted across the range, as well as Isofix anchor points for child seats. Anti-lock Braking System with Brake Assist and Electronic Brake Force Distribution driver support systems are also standard.
